scenarios.name: Basic Agent Creation
scenarios.description: Create a simple agent and verify it responds to chat
steps: Click on the newly created agent
Send message: 'Hello, can you confirm you're working?'
scenarios.verification: Did the agent respond with a coherent message?
scenarios.expected: Agent should respond confirming it's working
scenarios.notes: This is the most basic workflow - if this fails, check server logs

scenarios.name: Math Plugin Integration
scenarios.description: Create agent, enable math plugin, and test tool calling
steps: Observe the response and tool calls panel
scenarios.verification: Did the agent call the math tool and return 42?
scenarios.expected: Agent should use math tool and respond with '42'
scenarios.notes: Check 'Tool Calls' panel to verify the math tool was invoked

scenarios.name: Weather Plugin Test
scenarios.description: Test weather plugin with location query
steps: Send message: 'What's the weather in Tokyo?'
scenarios.verification: Did the agent call get_weather tool with location 'Tokyo'?
scenarios.expected: Agent should invoke weather tool and provide mock weather data
scenarios.notes: Weather plugin returns mock data - verify tool was called correctly

scenarios.name: Multi-Turn Conversation
scenarios.description: Test conversation memory and context retention
steps: Send message: 'My favorite color is blue'
Send message: 'What is my favorite color?'
scenarios.verification: Did the agent remember your favorite color?

scenarios.name: Multiple Plugins on One Agent
scenarios.description: Enable multiple plugins and verify agent can use both
steps: Send message: 'What is 10 + 5, and what's the weather in Paris?'
Observe if agent uses both tools
scenarios.verification: Did the agent call both math and weather tools?
scenarios.expected: Agent should use both tools and provide both answers
scenarios.notes: Check tool calls panel for both invocations

scenarios.name: Music Project Manager Plugin (macOS)
scenarios.description: Test music-project-manager plugin with real workflow
steps: Send message: 'Create a new project called Test Song'
scenarios.verification: Was the project created and listed?
scenarios.expected: Project should be created and visible in list
scenarios.notes: This tests real file system operations on macOS

scenarios.name: Ori-Reaper Plugin Integration (macOS)
scenarios.description: Test ori-reaper plugin with Reaper DAW
steps: Enable Reaper web interface (Preferences â†’ Control/OSC/web)
scenarios.expected: Track should be created and playback should start
scenarios.notes: Requires Reaper running with web interface enabled

scenarios.name: Plugin Health Check
scenarios.expected: All built plugins should report healthy status
scenarios.notes: If any plugin shows unhealthy, check server logs

scenarios.name: Error Recovery - Invalid Plugin
scenarios.description: Test system behavior with invalid plugin configuration
steps: Add non-existent plugin to enabled list
scenarios.verification: Did the system handle the error gracefully?
scenarios.expected: System should show error message without crashing

scenarios.name: Agent Deletion and Cleanup
scenarios.description: Verify agent deletion removes all associated data
steps: Check file system - verify agent directory removed
Refresh agent list - verify agent not shown
scenarios.verification: Was the agent and its data completely removed?
scenarios.expected: Agent directory should be deleted, agent not in list
scenarios.notes: Check agents/ directory to verify cleanup

scenarios.name: Ori-Music-Project-Manager Plugin
scenarios.description: Test music-project-manager plugin for creating and managing music projects
steps: Send message: 'Create a new project called Test Song in ~/Music/Projects'
Send message: 'List all my music projects'
Verify 'Test Song' appears in the list
Send message: 'What are the details of Test Song?'
scenarios.verification: Was the project created and can it be listed and queried?
scenarios.expected: Project created on file system, appears in list, details accessible

scenarios.name: Ori-Mac-OS-Tools Plugin
steps: Send message: 'What system am I running?'
Send message: 'What applications are currently running?'
scenarios.verification: Did the plugin provide accurate macOS system information?
scenarios.expected: System info, running apps, and directory info displayed correctly
scenarios.notes: Verify responses match actual system state

scenarios.name: Ori-Agent-Doc-Builder Plugin
steps: Send message: 'Build documentation for the current project'
Send message: 'What documentation formats are supported?'
scenarios.verification: Did the plugin generate documentation successfully?
scenarios.expected: Documentation built, formats listed, templates generated
scenarios.notes: Check output directories for generated docs

scenarios.name: Ori-Meta-Threads-Manager Plugin
steps: Send message: 'Create a new conversation thread about project planning'
Send message: 'Switch to the project planning thread'
Send message: 'What thread am I in?'
scenarios.expected: Threads created, listed, switched, and identified properly

scenarios.name: All Shared Plugins Load Test
scenarios.description: Verify all shared plugins can be loaded simultaneously
prerequisites: All shared plugins built (ori-music-project-manager, ori-reaper, ori-mac-os-tools, etc.)
steps: Enable ALL shared plugins one by one
Send message: 'Hello, I have multiple plugins enabled'
Check server logs for any errors
scenarios.verification: Did all plugins load without conflicts?
scenarios.expected: All plugins enabled successfully, no errors, agent functional
scenarios.notes: Tests plugin compatibility and resource usage
